abstract: Removes an unneeded placeholder cell from the table view.
overview:
## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the placeholder cell was removed, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the cell was no longer in the table view.

## Discussion

Call this method on your app’s main thread to remove a placeholder cell without swapping in a new cell. You might call this method if the user chooses to undo the insertion of a cell or if the contents of the table view changed.

# deletePlaceholder()

**Instance Method**

Removes an unneeded placeholder cell from the table view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func deletePlaceholder() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the placeholder cell was removed, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the cell was no longer in the table view.

## Discussion

Call this method on your app’s main thread to remove a placeholder cell without swapping in a new cell. You might call this method if the user chooses to undo the insertion of a cell or if the contents of the table view changed.
title: deletePlaceholder()
